channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats, civil rights groups push to extend voter registration in swing states battered by hurricanes
item.description: Voting rights groups were denied motions to extend the voter registration deadline in various swing states battered by Hurricanes Helene and Milton.
